/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architectural styles ranging from modern to traditional, reflecting the city's rich history and its march towards the future. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
